rules_text:
[i]One Becomes Many [/i]– When Lyrthindor, Last Justiciar enters, create three 1/1 black Rat creature tokens with lifelink, then it phases out until you control no Rats. [i](Treat it as though it doesn’t exist.)[/i]
[i]Speaker of the Swarm [/i]– Whenever Lyrthindor, Last Justiciar attacks, populate.
